name: @case-app/schematics
description: Set of schematics for CASE Framework

scripts.move: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/commands/create-resource/server-files && cp -aR ./src/commands/create-resource/server-files/* dist/commands/create-resource/server-files && mkdir -p dist/commands/create-resource/client-files && cp -aR ./src/commands/create-resource/client-files/* dist/commands/create-resource/client-files
scripts.publish: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish

author: Buddyweb
